p: Different formulations were elaborated based on Correa-Pacheco et al. (2017) methodology by varying the percentage of the components such as chitosan solution, chitosan nanoparticles, extract of propolis and nanoparticles of propolis ( Table 1). All formulations contained glycerol at 0.3% (J.T.Baker®) and canola oil at 0.1%. The final concentrations of the nanoparticles were of 20%, 30%, and 40%. Control consisted in Czapeck-dox agar medium.
